tasks.task_description: Add ID field to ServerGroup struct
Update saveGroupsToConfig to use group IDs in config format
Update loadGroupsFromConfig to handle group IDs
Update populateServerNamesFromConfig to use group_id instead of group_name
Update all group management functions to work with IDs
Update menu creation and management to use group IDs
Update server assignment functions to use group IDs
Update group lookup functions throughout the codebase
Add helper functions for ID-to-group and group-to-ID conversion

description: Refactor group management from name-based to ID-based references in MCPProxy configuration and code
context: Added ID field to ServerGroup struct. Now groups have both name and numeric ID for referencing.
Added helper functions for group ID management: getGroupByID, getGroupByName, getNextGroupID, getGroupKeyByID
Updated saveGroupsToConfig to save groups with IDs and use group_id field in server configs instead of group_name
Updated loadGroupsFromConfig to handle group IDs from config file and generate IDs for groups that don't have them
Updated populateServerNamesFromConfig to use group_id (new format) or group_name (legacy format) for backward compatibility
Updated all API group creation points to include IDs when creating ServerGroup instances

Server assignment functions work correctly with group names in memory, but persistence uses IDs. Menu creation works with existing group structure. All core functionality for ID-based group management is implemented.
